dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.ra.control.RevenueAssuranceParameter
dataStructure.description:
A variable whose value is used to determine compliance with a RevenueAssuranceObjective.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: RevenueAssuranceParameter

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail what the parmeter is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: raParmPerspective
child.description:
The point of view for the parameter, such as a single user instance or an aggregation.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: raParmPerspective

child.name: calculationFrequency
child.description:
The rate of occurrence that a value for a parameter is determined. For example, hourly, daily, weekly.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: calculationFrequency

child.name: raParmDerivationAlgorithm
child.description:
A step-by-step procedure used to calculate the parameter.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: raParmDerivationAlgorithm

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of itme during which the parameter is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which a parameter is known and distinguished from other RevenueAssuranceParameters.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: raParmCategory
child.description:
A grouping or set of parameters that are classified together because of common characteristics, such as technology specific, service specific, or technology/service independent.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: raParmCategory
